Articles.Content: If we get another mod or 2 going. (My rover, Buzz, whatever) I'll do an official Redwolf page where we showcase everything. Again, if that's cool with you guys.
Frell me dead! This is amazing!

Frell me dead! This is amazing!

Thanks! its good fun

Mike,

Little bit of an issue. With the new seating arrangement, we're getting a conflict between helmet and cockpit. Probably can fix it with a move down and/or back.

Take a look.

Go ahead and use the file on Kerbal stuff as I've done some updates for that last night.

Edited October 3, 2015 by Odyssey

I was going to use some code from texture replacer to remove helmets. if I move kerbal down, he/she goes through bottom.

we can scale up the ship maybe?
Either solution should work. I'm not sure which would be simpler from a coding perspective. We could scale up by a pretty small factor and I think that'd be fine.
Looks awesome and cant wait to try it out, as it happens though the parts are just flat out not showing up. I am running on 1.04 with a stock installation. Does this mod have any dependancies?

Looks awesome and cant wait to try it out, as it happens though the parts are just flat out not showing up. I am running on 1.04 with a stock installation. Does this mod have any dependancies?

Did you merge the folders?

Rasterpropmonitor is recommended, but not essential.

Did you merge the folders?

Rasterpropmonitor is recommended, but not essential.

when you say merge, could you clarify? ive currently got it sat in gamedata

Ah great!

it reminds me the BOR-4 used for the borane development.

http://www.buran.fr/bor/bor-desc.php (in french).

I don't know however if it is "inspired" from an other craft...

I notice there is many variations, like the x-crafts. All a bit different.

Also. I will sort out the helmet issue.

Best to scale up the craft maybe.

I will move the seat down a bit to see if it works.

Has there been a change in the folder structure? If there is duplicates they may caancel out eachother.

I don't know however if it is "inspired" from an other craft...

BOR is, basically, scaled down unmanned version of MiG-105 from the Spiral project.
Regarding the helmet issue: why not use the transparent pod module that RPM includes? I know it is possible to have it where the kerbals don't wear helmets.
Kottabos games did a video on this!!!

Kottabos games did a video on this!!!

Ayyyyeeeee! I was mentioned!

Here it is!

He calls me Odysseus, but that's close enough. Mike, I think we ought to consider a Moya mod just for the fun of flying something that big. With Moya and Talyn, we're talking ships the size of the SPH (actually way bigger, but I'm a realist) Tell me what you think. I think we could do it as a single-part mod for Moya, if we could figure out the doors and the starburst drive.

I think I can build a fair amount of the code if you and Spock can handle the modelling.

Edited October 10, 2015 by Odyssey
Edited October 11, 2015 by Mike-NZ

http://i.imgur.com/RFYtQYy.png

.......................

Here it is!

He calls me Odysseus, but that's close enough. Mike, I think we ought to consider a Moya mod just for the fun of flying something that big. With Moya and Talyn, we're talking ships the size of the SPH (actually way bigger, but I'm a realist) Tell me what you think. I think we could do it as a single-part mod for Moya, if we could figure out the doors and the starburst drive.

I think I can build a fair amount of the code if you and Spock can handle the modelling.

that was cool! enjoyed that

http://i.imgur.com/RFYtQYy.png

You did it you crazy son of a Kerbal!

2 things,

1- Send me the link so I can check it out and get her ready for hosting and posting

2- How does she fly?

oh man this is funny

but yeah, I have not yet set up much on BUZ yet.

Any chance for more "realistic" performance values? I'd really like to use this as a little mini shutte for my other large spaceplanes. Tried editing files myself, buuut i kinda broke it when i did that.

i made mine install a little bit more realistic simply by taking all the float-curves for ISP and such and halving the second values. This effectively makes it half as efficient. The thrust values aren't all that overpowered really.

- - - Updated - - -

2- How does she fly?

I thought buzz was a man... ?

i made mine install a little bit more realistic simply by taking all the float-curves for ISP and such and halving the second values. This effectively makes it half as efficient. The thrust values aren't all that overpowered really.

- - - Updated - - -

I thought buzz was a man... ?

As far as the fuel consumption. I'm having similar thoughts. Keep the spurs, but make the horse drink a little faster.

As far as Buzz, I was about to say "touche," but, come to think of it, you really can't be 100% sure since he never takes the suit off.

Hello, i have a big problem. i installed your mod and launched the game, but i have no command pod or anything, like everything in the build hanger is gone. even when i load a saved ship it says its missing parts. if you know anything about this please help. thank you
